categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Bairdon Jace was a human male and was the padawan of Khaat Qiyn. In 22 BBY, Jace fought in the First Battle of Geonosis, the opening battle of the Clone Wars.

Bairdon Jace was a human male who was the Padawan of Jedi Master Khaat Qiyn. Prior to the Invasion of Naboo, Jace was touring Coruscant with Qiyn when they both sensed the cold presence of Darth Maul, who was secretly tracking them from afar. Jace was unsure if what they sensed through the Force was true, and he asked his master if their senses could have possibly been betraying them. As the two Jedi walked away together, Qiyn warned her padawan that the shadows they had sensed held great rage that could swallow him whole in the mind, and that he should always trust in the Force.

In 22 BBY, he accompanied his master to Geonosis as part of the Jedi assault team to rescue Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker, and Padmé Amidala. He stormed the arena along with his master, and many comrades.
Bairdon Jace had gray hair, brown eyes, and light skin. After sensing Darth Maul, he thought he couldn't trust the Force.
Bairdon Jace was skilled in lightsaber combat.
Bairdon Jace wielded a blue lightsaber and wore Jedi robes.

Bairdon Jace first appeared in Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones and was played by Jason Baird, a creature makeup supervisor on the film. He was identified in the 2018 canon reference book Star Wars: The Complete Visual Dictionary, New Edition.
